item1.title: What is V-Tech technology?
item1.text: V-Tech is our advanced synthetic exosome technology that combines polynucleotides, peptides, and stem cell technology for optimal skin regeneration and medical aesthetic treatments.

item2.title: How does the treatment work?
item2.text: Our treatment uses advanced synthetic exosomes that enhance cellular communication, promote skin regeneration, and deliver professional-grade results through our unique delivery system.

item3.title: What are the benefits?
item3.text: Benefits include improved skin texture, reduced fine lines, enhanced collagen production, better skin elasticity, and professional-grade results suitable for medical aesthetic applications.

item4.title: Is it safe for all skin types?
item4.text: Yes, our V-Tech technology is designed to be safe for all skin types. However, we recommend consultation with a certified professional before treatment.

item5.title: How long do results last?
item5.text: Results typically last 6-12 months depending on individual factors and treatment protocol. Maintenance treatments can extend results.

item6.title: What training is required?
item6.text: Professional certification is required to use our products. We provide comprehensive training programs for medical professionals.
